banner.p3: "One step every day reveals a new you."
banner.desc: This extension is currently available only on Whale and Chrome browsers.

feature.subtitle1: Capture Knowledge the Moment You Discover It
feature.desc1: Whether you're browsing the web, reading articles, or watching videos, don't let valuable insights slip away. With our Chrome and Naver Whale extensions, you can save words and check their meanings with a single click—without leaving the current page. Your learning flow stays uninterrupted.
feature.subtitle2: Your Smart Vocabulary Notebook in Your Pocket
feature.desc2: Words saved on your PC are instantly synced to your mobile app. Whether you're on the subway during your commute or winding down before bed, you can turn idle moments into the most productive review sessions. With the Sisyphus-Academy app, your most powerful learning tool is always within reach.
feature.desc3: Sisyphus-Academy goes beyond simple vocabulary memorization. Based on your saved words, you'll access personalized quizzes, writing exercises, and in-depth articles on specific topics. What begins with a few saved terms becomes a journey of continuous, meaningful growth.
